questiontext.text:
Exercise

Study the graphs of the functions \(y=x^2\) and \(y=-x^2\), \(x \in \mathbb{R}\) and fill in the blanks:

\(y=x^2\) is [[1]] and

\(y=-x^2\) is [[1]].


Note: after checking the answer you will need to drag the items out of the boxes before allowing you to drag back in for the next attempt.
